description: Nightshade (Tilda Johnson), formerly known as Dr. Nightshade and Deadly Nightshade is a fictional character in the Marvel Universe.  She first appeared in Captain America #164 and was created by Steve Englehart and Alan Lee Weiss.
name: Nightshade
powers: Chemical serum that turns humans into werewolves
Chemical pheromones in her body allows her to affect the will of certain animals
Use of concentrated pheromones to control men through her allure
